name: Floresta Nova
description:
"Explore a World in VR inspired by Pandora from the film "Avatar"! Start in a Lab and interact with an Object to be transported to a Vibrant River and Sky Platforms following a Root to "Raiz da Vida" (The Tree of Life).

Developer, Visual Assets, Environments: G.Sedi

Narrative, Ambient Audio: SeanL

Programming, Development: Nole

Composer, SFX, Voice Acting: Ab
